definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter

sentences.english: Come back again next week for the results and another check of your blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 一周后来复诊看化验结果和复查血压。

sentences.english: It is important that patients comply with post-operative instructions and attend all post-surgery appointment.
sentences.chinese: 患者需遵照手术后的指示和复诊。

sentences.english: Carries on the clinical analysis by the subsequent visit patient curative effect.
sentences.chinese: 以复诊患者疗效进行临床分析。

sentences.english: Her recall visit intervals to the periodontist were twice yearly.
sentences.chinese: 她每年去牙周科医生那里复诊两次。

sentences.english: He was readmitted this time with a fungating tumor mass of hard palate and bilateral cervical lymph node enlargement.
sentences.chinese: 本次复诊发现腭面肿瘤呈蕈伞状，双颈部淋巴结肿大。

definition: to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
(TCM) interrogation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
to leave hospital/to be discharged from hospital
to accompany/(of a doctor etc) to do a follow-up (on a patient, client etc)
to follow the doctor's advice/as instructed by the physician
consultation (medical)/to meet for diagnosis/(by extension) consultation of different specialists
